document_title: Anal abscess: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
For anal abscess, the doctor will initially ask a number of questions related to the level of pain, duration of symptoms... to help plan appropriate treatment. After that, a number of diagnostic methods may be prescribed, including:
Endoscopy: Use an endoscope to look inside the anal canal and lower rectum (for cases where the abscess does not appear on the skin surface around the anus).; Blood tests.; Urine test.; Imaging diagnosis: X-ray, CT scan, MRI, ultrasound, in which MRI with magnetic contrast is the best diagnostic tool.
subsection_title: ap xe hau mon.json. Diagnosis of anal abscess
